title: Research Methodological Issues with Researching the Learner Voice.
abstract:
Metadata only entry.This chapter provides a summary of current research exploring students’ use of technologies. It focuses\ud
in particular on a case study carried out in the UK, which explored the use of technologies by students\ud
in four different disciplines. The case study included an online survey, audio logs and interviews. The\ud
findings suggest that students are now immersed in a technology-enhanced learning environment and\ud
use technologies extensively to support their learning activities. It points to changing digital literacy\ud
skills and has profound implications for educational institutions in terms of how courses are designed\ud
and delivered and in how students are supported in their learning
